description:
Hello,
I am Mark from Eastbourne in the UK.
By nature I am quite laid back and a relaxed sort of man. I am not aggressive but calm and caring.
I do have many interests and hobbies including visiting places of interests, walking in the countryside or along the beaches, gardening, listening to music etc.
I seek my soulmate 40-54, first as a friend and as we get to really know each other a close long term relationship.
I will send you my photo by request.
